name: Modern College Bus Sim
description:
Here its College bus driving and parking.Let’s have some fun with crazy college Bus Driving simulator.If you are crazy about driving the colleges buses and college coaches:Then college bus coach driving simulator is a best simulation game for real and energetic drivers like you who want to drive long in big city.Mostly students are very motivated for going to college:so In college bus driving trainer game you have to go about the big modern city for picking up the teens from different places standing on the bus stops.When you reach at spotted location,then you have to park the college bus very accurately in the given parking area.
Bus driving and parking games are loved by kids but driving a college bus is a very responsible task.Don’t go off road or you might get held in an accident.College bus driving is perfect driving simulation to play and have hours of fun.Discover the big city environment.
So be a college bus driver and control the bus to preform as a skilled bus driver simulator man.In this college coach simulator get into that famous college bus and use you controls to stay clear of dangers on the road with your driving skills.Get ready for a super sweet bus driving.College bus Pick Up Driving has a great AI system that will make the roads feel alive!college bus driving is a game for everyone to test driving skills ,you need to practice everything from parking, reversing and use your mental skills to keep calm.This simulator game is an open world driving simulator game,drive the college bus,do flips and stunts by clearing huge ramps,jump through hoops and explore the city.
Let me ask you this,do you love to drive something bigger? Driving a car is easy or parking one.But bus parking and driving takes real skills.The game has super smooth controls,realistic vehicle physics and challenging parking and driving missions. Parking bus is fun but not so much fun as a real new cool bus simulator in a 3D city.
Features:
-Smooth controls
-Awesome Bus driving challenge
-Beautiful 3d environment of city
-Play as a Simulated Bus Driver
-A Unique idea for School Going Students
